'''Ethan Forrester''' is the third-born son of Lord [[Gregor Forrester]] and one of the playable characters in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''. He is drawn to pursuits of the mind, particularly music and books. Ethan and his twin sister [[Talia Forrester|Talia]] both shared a great love for the towering trees of [[Ironrath]]. He was young when his house joined the [[War of the Five Kings]], and the end of the war placed him into a role which he was unprepared for.
sections.Quotes: '''Spoken about him'''{{Quote|When I left, he was just a boy. But when his house needed him, he rose to the task...like a lord.|Rodrik Forrester|The Lost Lords}}
